org.intermine.api.profile

Class Profile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.api.profile.Profile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnonProfile

    public class Profile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a user of the webapp The profile is responsible for informing its search repository of all web-searchable objects created or deleted on its watch.

      • Profile

        public Profile(ProfileManager manager,
       java.lang.String username,
       java.lang.Integer userId,
       java.lang.String password,
       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SavedQuery> savedQueries,
       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,InterMineBag> savedBags,
       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ApiTemplate> savedTemplates,
       java.lang.String token,
       boolean isLocal,
       boolean isSuperUser)
        Construct a Profile
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager for this profile
        username - the username for this profile
        userId - the id of this user
        password - the password for this profile
        savedQueries - the saved queries for this profile
        savedBags - the saved bags for this profile
        savedTemplates - the saved templates for this profile
        token - the token to use as an API key
        isLocal - true if the account is local
        isSuperUser - true if the user is a super user

      • Profile

        public Profile(ProfileManager manager,
       java.lang.String username,
       java.lang.Integer userId,
       java.lang.String password,
       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SavedQuery> savedQueries,
       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,InterMineBag> savedBags,
       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,InterMineBag> savedInvalidBags,
       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ApiTemplate> savedTemplates,
       java.lang.String token,
       boolean isLocal,
       boolean isSuperUser)
        Construct a Profile
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager for this profile
        username - the username for this profile
        userId - the id of this user
        password - the password for this profile
        savedQueries - the saved queries for this profile
        savedBags - the saved bags for this profile
        savedInvalidBags - the saved bags which type doesn't match with the model
        savedTemplates - the saved templates for this profile
        token - The token to use as an API key
        isLocal - true if the account is local
        isSuperUser - the flag identifying the super user

      • Profile

        public Profile(ProfileManager manager,
       java.lang.String username,
       java.lang.Integer userId,
       java.lang.String password,

       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ApiTemplate> savedTemplates,
       java.lang.String token,
       boolean isLocal,
       boolean isSuperUser)
        Construct a Profile
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager for this profile
        username - the username for this profile
        userId - the id of this user
        password - the password for this profile
        savedQueries - the saved queries for this profile
        bagset - a bagset (=valid and invalid bags) for this profile
        savedTemplates - the saved templates for this profile
        token - The token to use as an API key
        isLocal - true if the account is local
        isSuperUser - the flag identifying the super user

        public void setSuperuser(boolean isSuperUser)
                  throws ObjectStoreException
        Set the superuser flag and store it in userprofile database

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        Get the value of password
        Returns:
        the value of password

      • disableSaving

        public void disableSaving()
        Disable saving until enableSaving() is called. This is called before many templates or queries need to be saved or deleted because each call to ProfileManager.saveProfile() is slow.

      • enableSaving

        public void enableSaving()
        Re-enable saving when saveTemplate(), deleteQuery() etc. are called. Also calls ProfileManager.saveProfile() to write this Profile to the database and rebuilds the template description index.

      • getSavedTemplates

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ApiTemplate> getSavedTemplates()
        Get the users saved templates
        Returns:
        saved templates

      • saveTemplate

                ApiTemplate template)
                  throws BadTemplateException
        Save a template
        Parameters:
        name - the template name
        template - the template
        Throws:
        BadTemplateException - if the template name is invalid.

      • getTemplate

        public ApiTemplate getTemplate(java.lang.String name)
        get a template
        Parameters:
        name - the template
        Returns:
        template

      • deleteTemplate

        public void deleteTemplate(java.lang.String name,
                  TrackerDelegate trackerDelegate,
                  boolean deleteTracks)
        Delete a template and its tags, rename the template tracks adding the prefix "deleted_" to the previous name. If trackerDelegate is null, the template tracks are not renamed
        Parameters:
        name - the template name
        trackerDelegate - used to rename the template tracks.
        deleteTracks - true if we want to delete the tracks associated to the template. Actually the tracks have never been deleted but only renamed

      • getSavedQueries

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SavedQuery> getSavedQueries()
        Get the value of savedQueries
        Returns:
        the value of savedQueries

      • saveQuery

        public void saveQuery(java.lang.String name,
             SavedQuery query)
        Save or update a query. If a query with the given name exists in this profile, that query will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        name - the query name
        query - the query

      • saveQueries

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> saveQueries(java.util.Map<? extends java.lang.String,? extends PathQuery> toSave)
        Save the map of queries as given to the user's profile, avoiding all possible name collisions. This method will not overwrite any existing user data.
        Parameters:
        toSave - The queries to save.
        Returns:
        successes The queries as they were saved.

        public void fixInvalidBag(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String newType)
                   throws UnknownBagTypeException,
                          ObjectStoreException
        Fix this bag by changing its type
        Parameters:
        name - the invalid bag name
        newType - The new type of this list
        Throws:
        UnknownBagTypeException - If the new type is not in the current model.
        ObjectStoreException - If there is a problem saving state to the DB.

        Get the value of savedBags current
        Returns:
        the value of savedBags

      • saveBag

        public void saveBag(InterMineBag bag)
        Stores a new bag in the profile. Note that bags are always present in the user profile database, so this just adds the bag to the in-memory list of this profile.
        Parameters:
        bag - the InterMineBag object

      • saveBag

        public void saveBag(java.lang.String name,
           InterMineBag bag)
        Stores a new bag in the profile. Note that bags are always present in the user profile database, so this just adds the bag to the in-memory list of this profile.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the bag
        bag - the InterMineBag object

      • createBag

        public InterMineBag createBag(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String type,
                     java.lang.String description,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<org.intermine.metadata.FieldDescriptor>> classKeys)
                       throws UnknownBagTypeException,
                              ClassKeysNotFoundException,
                              ObjectStoreException
        Create a bag and save it to the userprofile database.
        Parameters:
        name - the bag name
        type - the bag type
        description - the bag description
        classKeys - the classKeys used to obtain the primary identifier field
        Returns:
        the new bag
        Throws:
        UnknownBagTypeException - if the bag type is wrong
        ClassKeysNotFoundException - if the classKeys is empty
        ObjectStoreException - if something goes wrong

      • deleteBag

        public void deleteBag(java.lang.String name)
               throws ObjectStoreException
        Delete a bag from the user account, if user is logged in also deletes from the userprofile database. If there is no such bag associated with the account, no action is performed.
        Parameters:
        name - the bag name
        Throws:
        ObjectStoreException - if problems deleting bag

      • updateBagType

        public void updateBagType(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String newType)
                   throws UnknownBagTypeException,
                          ObjectStoreException
        Update the type of bag. If there is no such bag associated with the account, no action is performed.
        Parameters:
        name - the bag name
        newType - the type to set
        Throws:
        UnknownBagTypeException - if the bag type is wrong
        ObjectStoreException - if problems storing bag

      • renameBag

        public void renameBag(java.lang.String oldName,
             java.lang.String newName)
               throws ObjectStoreException
        Rename an existing bag, throw exceptions when bag doesn't exist of if new name already exists. Moves tags from old bag to new bag.
        Parameters:
        oldName - the bag to rename
        newName - new name for the bag
        Throws:
        ObjectStoreException - if problems storing

      • updateTemplate

        public void updateTemplate(java.lang.String oldName,
                  ApiTemplate template)
                    throws ObjectStoreException,
                           BadTemplateException
        Update an existing template, throw exceptions when template doesn't exist. Moves tags from old template to new template.
        Parameters:
        oldName - the template to rename
        template - the new template
        Throws:
        ObjectStoreException - if problems storing
        BadTemplateException - if bad template

      • getWebSearchablesByType

        type - the type (from TagTypes)
        Returns:
        the Map

      • getDayToken

        A token for web-service use.

        public boolean isLocal()
        Returns true if this is a local account, and not, for example, an OpenID account.

        Whether or not this is a local account.

        Returns:

      • getPreferences

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getPreferences()
        Get the object representing the preferences of this user. Changes to this user's preferences can be written directly into this object.
        Returns:
        A representation of the preferences of a user.

      • prefers

        public boolean prefers(java.lang.String preference)
        Determine whether a user perfers a certain thing or not.
        Parameters:
        preference - The name of the preference.
        Returns:
        Whether this preference is set by this user.
